data.title: Bureau of Cannabis Control to Hold Public Licensing Workshop in Ukiah
data.excerpt: SACRAMENTO – The Bureau of Cannabis Control (Bureau) will host a public licensing workshop in Ukiah on Thursday, March 1.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
